title: Wordpress Developer
description: Made a wordpress website for the organization with the help of team member.
Made regular updates on the availability of the products provided by the organization.
Available for the queries of 150+ students.

title: Web Development Intern
description: Developed a full stack web app for the organization which can handle requests for more than 200 users.
Built the backend using Node.js with Express server and modelled the database layer using MongoDB through mongoose wrapper.
Helped team mates in building the frontend using React.js
